Transcription for 548067

internationale
I do not know.
Come with the glider,
really over the fire.
Come on, my little wind,
glue thy glider again,
all the bones in the steel of fire.
And I want a kid
who will not let in a wind
the wind that soars and the glider in line.
Run closer and scream,
tell if those are a thing.
I'll find the glider,
really, really high.
Tell me, can I,
find a piece of the glider, please,
out of bones in the steel of fire?
Out of bones in the steel of fire?
